query: select distinct    current_database()  , isc.table_schema  , schema_owner  , isc.table_name  , isc.column_name  , isc.data_type  , isc.is_nullable, '' as table_type  from information_schema.columns isc  left outer join information_schema.schemata iss on isc.table_schema = iss.schema_name where table_schema not in ('information_schema', 'pg_catalog')

select distinct c.table_catalog as current_database, c.table_schema, '' as schema_owner, c.table_name, c.column_name, c.data_type, c.is_nullable, t.table_type FROM `region-eu`.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS c left outer join `region-eu`.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES t on t.table_catalog = c.table_catalog and t.table_schema = c.table_schema and t.table_name = c.table_name
